body:
hello avicastians
my team TheCrazyBeaners will play tomorrow I think, I was told by the team leader we're playing aganist that we are going to play on saturday but now I saw a post where it sais we're going to play tomorrow so i'm kinda confused
can I get someone to tell me the exact day + time please?
thanks
